main: Incredible... A true remnant before our very eyes. Can you believe it, Gilles?
Yes, actually. We beckoned the damn thing.
Can you speak then, remnant? What is your name?
Seems perfectly responsive, answers questions, maybe a bit dull. I'd say the awakening was a success.
We had a part in that, but if you're asking if we're the voice that spoke to you, then no. We're Servants of the Blue, last bastions of pure humanity.
I think you've been told what to do already? Our job here is to guide you, if you have any questions to ask, feel free.
What you just stepped out of is a world portal, you'll run into them around the world. The Orb Bearers have severed the link back here, so you'll have to fix those for us.
Don't worry, there's a little something in it for you too. Run along now.
